Class MusicCreatorModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • MusicCreatorModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MusicCreatorOperations

    public class MusicCreatorModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements MusicCreatorOperations
    A class than implements MusicCreatorOperations in order to store, create, remove, and manipulate Note Objects.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MusicCreatorModel() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addBeat(Note selectedNote, int startTime, int duration)
      Adds a beat to Note object passed to it at startTime for as long as duration designates.
      void addNote(Note newNote)
      Adds Note object to a provided list of Notes.
      void removeBeat(Note selectedNote, int startTime)
      Removes a beat at selected Note object.
      void removeFirstNote()
      Removes first note from any collection of notes available.
      void removeLastNote()
      Removes last note from any collection of notes available.
      java.lang.String showSheetMusic()
      Appends the beats of all Note objects within the class, as well as the Note values themselves, and accompanying beat values.
      void startCreator(Note firstNote, Note secondNote)
      Creates the initial set of note in between, and including, the two Note objects passed to it, regardless of whichever note is of higher octave or pitch.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • startCreator

        public void startCreator(Note firstNote,
                         Note secondNote)
        Description copied from interface: MusicCreatorOperations
        Creates the initial set of note in between, and including, the two Note objects passed to it, regardless of whichever note is of higher octave or pitch.
        Specified by:
        startCreator in interface MusicCreatorOperations
        Parameters:
        firstNote - One of two endpoints in the new set of Note objects.
        secondNote - Two of two endpoints in the new set of Note objects. Can be either higher or lower than firstNote.

      • addNote

        public void addNote(Note newNote)
             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Description copied from interface: MusicCreatorOperations
        Adds Note object to a provided list of Notes. Also creates additional Note objects in between passed object and closest created Note in terms of pitch and octave, if needed.
        Specified by:
        addNote in interface MusicCreatorOperations
        Parameters:
        newNote - Note to be added to list.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • addBeat

        public void addBeat(Note selectedNote,
                    int startTime,
                    int duration)
             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Description copied from interface: MusicCreatorOperations
        Adds a beat to Note object passed to it at startTime for as long as duration designates. Keep in mind that the startTime is included in duration.
        Specified by:
        addBeat in interface MusicCreatorOperations
        Parameters:
        selectedNote - Desired Note destination of beat.
        startTime - Start time of beat.
        duration - Duration of beat (startTime included).
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • removeBeat

        public void removeBeat(Note selectedNote,
                       int startTime)
                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Description copied from interface: MusicCreatorOperations
        Removes a beat at selected Note object. Only the startTime of the beat must be passed; the complete beat in its entire duration will be removed.
        Specified by:
        removeBeat in interface MusicCreatorOperations
        Parameters:
        selectedNote - Note of beat being removed.
        startTime - startTime of being removed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • showSheetMusic

        public java.lang.String showSheetMusic()
        Description copied from interface: MusicCreatorOperations
        Appends the beats of all Note objects within the class, as well as the Note values themselves, and accompanying beat values.
        Specified by:
        showSheetMusic in interface MusicCreatorOperations
        Returns:
        A string of all beats and notes added to the class, in crude, musical format.
